title: Enhancing Clinical Practical Competencies: Standards-Based Mobile Adaptive Language Course Design

context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can utilize 150 job-related core vocabulary items contextually.
Learners can perform 5-minute adaptive learning activities three times daily in a mobile environment.
Learners can demonstrate language proficiency aligned with real-world work scenarios through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
